New Records: Mayank Yadav delivered a maiden over in his T20I debut.
Mayank Yadav took his first international wicket in his second over.
Arshdeep Singh was awarded as the 'Player of the Match' for his performance.
India scored 132/3 in 11.5 overs, the fastest win in the match.
Key Match Events: India won the match by 7 wickets.
Varun Chakravarthy and Arshdeep Singh each took 3 wickets.
Mayank Yadav's debut and contributions were significant.
Hardik Pandya scored 39 runs in the latter stages.
Pre-Game Insights: India decided to bowl first after winning the toss.
Varun Chakravarthy returned to the team after a gap of three years.
Mayank Yadav made his debut and impressed with his performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav highlighted the team's character and performance.
Najmul Hossain Shanto discussed Bangladesh's batting struggles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather was sunny and dry, favorable for batting.
The match was live-streamed on Sports 18 and JioCinema.
Others: Playing XI for India: Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Suryakumar Yadav, Nitish Reddy, Hardik Pandya, Riyan Parag, Rinku Singh, Washington Sundar, Varun Chakravarthy, Arshdeep Singh, Mayank Yadav.

Playing XI for Bangladesh: Litton Das, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Parvez Hossain Emon, Towhid Hridoy, Mahmudullah, Jaker Ali, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Shoriful Islam.
Shivam Dube was ruled out due to a back injury, replaced by Tilak Varma.
